Title: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a feasibility study on the use of small modular reactors
Summary: Directs the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a feasibility study and prepare a report on the benefits and implementation of nuclear small modular reactors.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the New York state energy research and development authority to conduct a feasibility study on the use of small modular reactors
